item.title: DISH
item.description: score:-47 Chances: DISH Network Corp. operates in the consumer discretionary sector, which tends to perform well if the products are great. The partnership with BrightLine to offer interactive ad units on SLING TV could provide new revenue opportunities for DISH Media. The company’s Wireless segment, with its wireless spectrum licenses, could offer growth potential in the future.
